reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Providing UK expertise on Power Sector Reform in Jiangsu to facilitate low carbon transition.

description.narrative: This project will accelerate power sector reform process in Jiangsu with UK policy and market expertise. It is part of the multi-year China Energy and Low Carbon programme and focuses on clean technology policy and regulation. The success of this project will facilitate Jiangsu’s low carbon transition and accelerate China's overall energy transition to a sustainable, low carbon economy. As a secondary benefit, policy, operation and technical needs arising from these reforms offer new opportunities for UK-China collaboration. This will generate opportunities for international business in the Energy and low Carbon sectors, bringing potential and bring potential benefits to British companies in a sector where they are well placed to compete. [Following a methodology change, from financial year 19/20 costs under this activity will be reported against a new activity line. You can find the new IATI identifier by looking up “other identifier information”.]
